channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Exposed drain corner, 12th February
item.description:
The newly repaired pothole is open again, and the drain corner is exposed. Likely to cause damage to vehicles

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5,7,9, High Street, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Heavy vehicles, speeding around bend, potholes, 12th February
item.description:
I’ve lived at no.9 Blackbrook Lane for 40 years and I know that I speak for my neighbours as well in saying the roads are in a terrible state; so much so that when vehicles pass along Southborough/Blackbrook, my bed shakes at night due to the state of the roads. I’m woken at least 3 times a night because of this. Also, cars speed around the corner of Southborough up Blackbrook, where people try to cross the road, which is very dangerous for pedestrians. PLEASE FIX THIS AS WE ARE CONSIDERING MOVING HOUSE AFTER 40 YEARS of living here!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackbrook Lane, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped a fridge by commercial bin, 12th February
item.description:
Owner at flat 74/ 75 county street seen two men bring a fridge at 8.53pm use a trolley to bring fridge down the street and dump it behind the red commercial bin

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harper Road, Walworth, Greater London

item.title: Terrible pothole, 12th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosebery Avenue, Clerkenwell, Greater London

item.title: A series of rapidly growing potholes, 12th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Pleasant, East Barnet, Greater London

item.title: Huge pothole on mini roundabout, 12th February
item.description:
Huge pothole has appeared on the mini roundabout. Started as a small dip but now cannot drive over it safely. Trying to turn in or out of Bickley Park Road is horrendous. People are trying to avoid so swerving in front of other cars going round the roundabout so is becoming very dangerous. Going to cause damage to cars as well due to the very uneven and bumpy road surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bickley Park Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
